xxl.core.pipes.memoryManager.heartbeat
Interface Heartbeat

All Known Subinterfaces:
HeartbeatPipe
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTemporalPipe, AbstractTemporalSink, AbstractTemporalSource, AbstractTimeStampPipe, AbstractTimeStampSink, AbstractTimeStampSource, Coalesce, CountBasedWindow, HeartbeatTests.TimeStampHBSource, NestedTemporalWindow, PlanMigration.ReferencePointSplit, PlanMigration.ReferencePointUnion, PNAbstractSink, Split, SWTSink, SWTSink.InternalSink, SyncTimeStampSource, TemporalAggregator, TemporalDifference, TemporalDistinct, TemporalFilter, TemporalGroupAndAggregator, TemporalJoin, TemporalMapper, TemporalUnion, TemporalWindow, Tester, TimeGranularity, TimeStampCursorSource, TimeStampIdentityPipe, VisualSink
public interface Heartbeat

The implementation of this interfaces allows to use heartbeats for memory management. For a detailed discussion see "Widom and Srivastava - Flexible Time Managemaent in Data Stream Systems".

heartbeat

void heartbeat(long timeStamp,
               int sourceID)
This method accepts a heartbeat(the timestamp) from the source with the given id.

Parameters:
timeStamp - the heartbeat.
sourceID - the source id from the source that deliverd the heartbeat.
